We provide
quality execution for your big ideas & small tasks

Acalista group is well-experienced in creation of web-sites for businesses of different size and spheres. It does not matter what type of business you start or want to improve – we will find a perfect stack of technologies for your requirements. For blogs, portfolios, business card websites, catalogue sites we can find a solution with WordPress development. When it comes to E-commerce business, Gambling, Betting web-sites – our experts will create a huge platform with the help of frameworks.

We provide as well a Mobile App development for your web-site. A native app can interface with the device’s features and hardware, such as the camera, GPS location, and so on. It can run without internet connection that is why your customers will be engaged in services of your company all the time. Our main aim is a full web-assistance for your business.
